p: During this investigation M. piperita EO showed high activity against E. coli. These results are in agreement with Goudjil et al. [ 21], who tested M. piperita EO against some Gram positive and Gram negative bacteria and found the highest antimicrobial activity versus E. coli. Other authors verified the antimicrobial properties of peppermint EO and attributed the activity to the major components menthol and its oxidative compound menthone [ 22, 23].
